Augusta-Richmond County.List of tallest buildings in Augusta, Ge: This list of tallest buildings in Augusta ranks skyscrapers and other buildings by height in the U.S. city of Augusta, Georgia. The tallest building in Augusta is the Lamar Building, at 19 floors, followed by the River Place Condominiums, at 18 floors. The Wells Fargo Building (formerly the Wachovia Bank Center) is the third-highest at 17 floors.
